citations.narrative:
The light colored water bottles used for the rabbits have a build of a green material on the inside of the bottles .
Clean water is important for the health and well being of the rabbits. Water receptacles shall be sanitized when dirty
or at least once every 2 weeks. CORRECT BY : 4/29/18
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with a facility employee .

narrative:
3.55
WATERING.    
The light colored water bottles used for the rabbits have a build of a green material on the inside of the bottles .
Clean water is important for the health and well being of the rabbits. Water receptacles shall be sanitized when dirty
or at least once every 2 weeks. CORRECT BY : 4/29/18
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with a facility employee .

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
